short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: At the end of Pokemon Showdown battles, this extension hides your elo changes (and your opponent's) to reduce stress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When playing on Pokemon Showdown, seeing your elo rise or drop at the end of a battle can be stressful. This extension hides elo changes at the end of battles.
